Description: Position Summary:The OB-GYN Specialist will offer specialized medical care within the field of Obstetrics and Gynecology. They will diagnose and treat complex cases, perform surgeries, and provide expert consultations to patients. The Specialist will also contribute to medical research, professional development, and the enhancement of departmental practices.Skills
Skills:
MBBS degree from a recognized medical school.
Master's degree or Ph.D. in Obstetrics and Gynecology.
Minimum of 4 years of post-graduation experience in Obstetrics and Gynecology.
Demonstrable expertise in specialized areas of OB-GYN.
Proficiency in performing surgical procedures.
Strong analytical and decision-making skills.
Active involvement in medical research and academic pursuits.
